attributes.action: ensure that our judges be elected for criminal cases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For to long now sentences have proved unacceptable to the vast majority of the public, inexplicable and over leniant, by election we would get the justice we deserve the only qualification should be age and an absense of criminal background   after all if we the public can decide on innocent or guilty then we should decidde on sentence
